## LOGIN\_MUTATION variable

This mutation login/signin the user to the app. It validates the user from the credentials.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
LOGIN_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/auth_mutations/login.js)
